page.title: 15Changes in Ridgewood.
page.content: There have been many changes since the 1960's. A{pottery}closed then and most of the men who worked there (from 6.00am to 6.00pm) lived in Ridgewood. Now people tend to work in Uckfield or much further away. Two{housing estates have been built in the 1980's. Those living here now are mostly 'Uckfield' people but some are new to the area. Elderly people who have lived here for most of their lives view these changes differently. It used to be more peaceful. Although some feel that there are too many houses and cars more believe that it is for the good. Many people from the community have been involved with raising funds for a new{pavilion}which is being built in the recreation ground. Perhaps some sports teams will be revived and once again provide entertainment for young and old alike.
